feed.title: Cartwright Junction (Trans-Labrador Hwy) - Weather - Environment Canada

entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , Cartwright Junction (Trans-Labrador Hwy)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 02:02 AM NST Tuesday 17 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Snow or freezing rain. Temperature rising to minus 4 by morning.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow at times mixed with ice pellets beginning this evening then changing to freezing rain overnight. Snow and ice pellet amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature rising to minus 4 by morning. Wind chill minus 20 this evening and minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Freezing rain. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Freezing rain. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light in the morning. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 12 in the morning and minus 6 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Freezing rain. Temperature steady near minus 2.
entry.summary: Freezing rain. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 2. Wind chill near minus 7. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Freezing rain or snow. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Freezing rain or snow. High plus 1. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Flurries. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Flurries. Low minus 3. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Flurries. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Flurries. High minus 1. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 12. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Low minus 12. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 9.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 9. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Cloudy periods. Low minus 19.
entry.summary: Cloudy periods. Low minus 19. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 12. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Cloudy periods. Low minus 17.

entry.title: Sunday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 11.
